data.text: Elihu toaa ne kasa so se,
“Montɔ mo bo ase kakra mma me, na mɛkyerɛ mo sɛ
Minya me nimdeɛ fi akyirikyiri;
Munnye nto mu sɛ me nsɛm yɛ nokware turodoo;
“Onyankopɔn so, nanso, ontwiri nnipa;
Ɔmma amumɔyɛfo ntena nkwa mu,
Onnyi nʼani mfi ɔtreneeni so,
Na sɛ wɔde mpokyerɛ gu nnipa
ɔka nea wɔayɛ kyerɛ wɔn
Ɔma wotie nteɛso
Sɛ wɔyɛ osetie na wɔsom no a,
Na sɛ wɔantie no a, wɔbɛyera wɔ afoa ano,
“Wɔn a wonnim Nyame no kora abufuw so;
Wowuwu wɔ wɔn mmabunmmere mu,
Nanso wɔn a wohu amane no, ogye wɔn;
“Ɔregye wo afi ahohia mu
Nanso mprempren, atemmu a ɛfata amumɔyɛfo na aba wo so;
Hwɛ yiye na obi amfa ahonya annaadaa wo;
Wʼahonya anaasɛ mpo
Mpere anadwo ho,
Hwɛ na woannan ankɔ bɔne ho,
“Onyankopɔn yɛ ɔkɛse wɔ ne tumi mu.
Hena na wahyehyɛ nʼakwan ama no
Kae na kamfo nʼadwuma a
Adesamma nyinaa ahu;
Onyankopɔn yɛ ɔkɛse, ɛboro yɛn ntease so!
“Ɔtwetwe nsu a ɛsosɔ,
na omununkum tɔ obosu gu fam
Hena na obetumi ate sɛnea ɔtrɛtrɛw omununkum mu no ase,
Hwɛ sɛnea ɔhwete nʼanyinam mu wɔ ne ho
Eyi ne ɔkwan a ɔfa so di amanaman no so
Ɔde anyinam hyɛ ne nsam ma
Nʼaprannaa bɔ ahum a ɛreba no ho nkae;
